name: Basil-Garlic Mashed Potatoes
keywords: basil, gold potatoes, low-fat buttermilk, side dish
recipeIngredient: 2 pounds scrubbed, unpeeled thin skinned potatoes (Yukon golds if possible). sliced 1/4 inch thick
1 cup or more lowfat or nonfat buttermilk
Salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Cook the potato slices and garlic in water to cover until the potatoes are tender, about 10 minutes.
Mash, peel and all, in a food mill. (The little bit of skin that goes through is not a problem.). Stir in the basil and buttermilk to a creamy consistency; season with salt and pepper.
